lyrics_without_chords.1:
Marvelous grace of our loving Lord,
Grace that exceeds our sin and our guilt!
Yonder on Calvary's mount out-poured–
There where the blood of the Lamb was spilt.
lyrics_without_chords.chorus:
Grace, grace, God's grace,
Grace that will pardon and cleanse within;
Grace, grace, God's grace,
Grace that is greater than all our sin!
lyrics_without_chords.2:
Sin and despair, like the sea-waves cold,
Threaten the soul with infinite loss;
Grace that is greater– yes, grace untold–
Points to the Refuge, the mighty Cross.
lyrics_without_chords.3:
Marvelous, infinite, matchless grace,
Freely bestowed on all who believe!
All who are longing to see His face,
Will you this moment His grace receive?

lyrics_with_chords.1:
[G]Marvelous grace of our [C]loving [G]Lord,
Grace that [G]exceeds our [C]sin and our [G]guilt!
Yonder on [C]Calvary's [G]mount out-[D]poured–
There where the [G]blood of the [D]Lamb was [G]spilt.
lyrics_with_chords.chorus:
[G]Grace, [G]grace, [C]God's [G]grace,
Grace that will [G]pardon and [C]cleanse with[G]in;
Grace, [G]grace, [C]God's [G]grace,
Grace that is [G]greater than [D]all our [G]sin!
lyrics_with_chords.2:
[G]Sin and despair, like the [C]sea-[G]waves cold,
Threaten the [G]soul with [C]infinite [G]loss;
Grace that is [C]greater– [G]yes, grace un-[D]told–
Points to the [G]Refuge, the [D]mighty [G]Cross.
lyrics_with_chords.3:
[G]Marvelous, infinite, [C]match-[G]less [C]grace,
Freely be[C]stowed on [G]all who be[D]lieve!
All who are [G]longing to [D]see His [G]face,
Will you this [G]moment His [D]grace re[G]ceive?
